p: There is evidence that ECoV neurological symptoms may overlap as in Bickerstaffâ€™s encephalitis (BBE) overlapping with GBS in MERS cases, it is important to note, BBE cases who acquire limb weakness diagnosed as having an overlap with GBS, yet, BBE, together with MFS and GBS thought to set a perpetual clinical spectrum [21], [73]. Mimics require exclusion with the aid of clinical history, cerebral MRI, and CSF conclusions whereby CSF albuminocytologic dissociation and the appearance of antiganglioside antibodies and may aid BBE confirmation [21], [74].
